tool_description:
ESportApi offers eSports results for League of Legends, Dota 2, Counter-Strike providing also eSports standings and tournament live scores.
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
name: ESportApi
title: ESportApi

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for E-Sports players, teams, and tournaments by providing a search term.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The search term.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esportapi1.p.rapidapi.com/api/esport/search/ATK"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esportapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://esportapi1.p.rapidapi.com/api/esport/search/{term}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esportapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: TVCountries
api_list.description: Get a list of countries and their respective TV channels broadcasting a specific Football match.

api_list.name: TeamLastMatches
api_list.description: Get the last matches for a specific E-Sports team by providing the team ID and the page number.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: The zero-based page number.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the team for which you want to retrieve the last matches.

api_list.name: LeagueSeasonInfo
api_list.description: Get the season information for a specific E-Sports league by providing the tournament ID and season ID.

required_parameters.name: tournamentId
required_parameters.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league's season info.

required_parameters.name: seasonId
required_parameters.description: The season ID for which you want to retrieve the league's season info.

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.description: Get all available e-sports categories.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://esportapi1.p.rapidapi.com/api/esport/tournament/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esportapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: EventH2HDuel
api_list.description: Get head-to-head duel information of a specific E-Sports event by providing its ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the event for which you want to get head-to-head duel information.

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "esportapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: LeagueNextMatches
api_list.description: Get the next matches for a specific E-Sports league by providing the tournament ID, season ID, and page number.

required_parameters.name: seasonId
required_parameters.description: The season ID for which you want to retrieve the league's next matches.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Zero-based page number.

required_parameters.name: tournamentId
required_parameters.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league's next matches.

api_list.name: CategorySchedules
api_list.description: Get e-sports schedules for a specific day from a specific category.

required_parameters.name: month
required_parameters.description: The month you want to retrieve the schedules

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The category id you want to retrieve the schedules

required_parameters.name: day
required_parameters.description: The day you want to retrieve the schedules

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year you want to retrieve the schedules
